settings.name: SteadyShot
settings.description: Sets whether to use SteadyShot for still image shooting

settings.name: SteadyShot Adjust.
settings.description: Sets the SteadyShot adjustment when using a lens with SteadyShot function

settings.name: SteadyShot Focal Len.
settings.description: Sets the focal length when using [SteadyShot Adjust.] set to [Manual]

settings.name: SteadyShot Type
settings.description: Sets the SteadyShot effect for different shooting conditions

settings.name: Movie SteadyShot
settings.description: Sets the SteadyShot effect for movie recording

settings.name: SteadyShot Adjust.
settings.description: Sets the SteadyShot adjustment when using a lens with SteadyShot function
